price: 29. Haddaadse rabtaan Allaah iyo Rasuulkiisa iyo Daarta Aakhiro, hubaal Alle wuxuu u diyaarshay samo falooyinka idinka mid ah abaalgud weyn (Janno).
arabic: وَإِن كُنتُنَّ تُرِدۡنَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ وَٱلدَّارَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَعَدَّ لِلۡمُحۡسِنَٰتِ مِنكُنَّ أَجۡرًا عَظِيمٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-in kuntunna turid'na al-laha warasūlahu wal-dāra al-ākhirata fa-inna al-laha aʿadda lil'muḥ'sināti minkunna ajran ʿaẓīman
